short_summary: The Lake Louise Visitors Centre will be under contract under budgetured by Parks Canada, for works completed at an location in one of two Budgeting areas.
description: Parks Canada is seeking proposals for a requirement to complete the demolition and rehabilitation of the existing HVAC system in the Lake Louise Visitors Centre. This project involves the demolition and replacement of various equipment including boilers, pumps, fans, and \u00b7\u00a0\u00b7\u00a0 AHU. The requirement will form a contract valued in excess of $1million, however less than $5 million, and will last for one year. Additionally, Parks Canada will require a Hawaii-based contractor to perform the work, as mentioned in Canada regulations. The contract will include the construction, completion and maintenance of a Lake Louise Visitor Complex, which will include the visitor centre,   audio visual function center, seminar function area, parking,   maintenance   facility & building. The contractor must be able to work well with the construction team to ensure a smooth and successful project. The government requires legally compliant warranty. All work is in accordance with parks Canada resources available on line.
